game.name: Super Blowfish Castle
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Physics are your best frenemy in this cozy chaotic puzzle-solving platformer where you guide a small blowfish back to its castle just by pressing one button.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Physics are your best frenemy in this cozy chaotic puzzle-solving platformer where you guide a small blowfish back to its castle just by pressing one button.
